dict.acceptation: 鞋；蹄铁；（汽车轮的）制动器，煞车；外胎；
为…钉蹄铁；给…穿上鞋；装防护物；

sent.orig: A long vowel is a long sound as in the word'shoe".
sent.trans: 长元音即如“shoe”一词中的长音。

sent.orig: A long vowel is a long sound as in the word "shoe".
sent.trans: 长元音即如“shoe”一词中的长音。

sent.orig: Resin, Shoes Components and Accessories, Shoe Polisher, Shoe Lace, Shoe Dye Shoe Polisher.
sent.trans: 采购产品树脂，鞋零件和附件，擦鞋抛光机，擦鞋花边，擦鞋染料。

sent.orig: Shoe cannot too too too thin, thick, hard, had better wear travel shoe.
sent.trans: 鞋不能太薄、太厚、太硬，最好穿旅游鞋。袜子不要带补丁。

sent.orig: Rubber overshoes mould includes canister of shoe model, roller and last for shaping a shoe.
sent.trans: 胶鞋模具包括鞋模、辊筒与鞋楦。
